nodes.text: Hera's A-wing was an RZ-1 A-wing interceptor used by the rebel pilot Hera Syndulla. Syndulla was the leader of Phoenix Squadron, a squadron of A-wing fighters that was a part of the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire.

In 3 BBY, Syndulla flew her A-wing alongside other Phoenix Squadron pilots in the Concord Dawn system, hoping to gain permission from the Mandalorian Protectors to pass through the system as part of a new hyperspace route to the planet Lothal, however the rebels were attacked by the Protectors, who were working with the Empire, leaving Syndulla's fighter badly damaged.
